channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Some Educated Guesses About Trump’s Second Term
item.description: In our final episode of WIRED Politics Lab, we make some predictions about the next four years with Donald Trump back in the White House.

item.title: Why the US Military Can't Just Shoot Down the Mystery Drones

item.title: Tips for ChatGPT’s Voice Mode? Best AI Uses for Retirees? Our Expert Answers Your Questions
item.description: If you missed our second live, subscriber-only Q&A with WIRED’s AI columnist Reece Rogers, you can watch the replay here.
